full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BZANG PO SPYOD SMON LAM GYI 'CHI BSLU BA'I CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (MCHOD PA RNAM LNGA NI, ME TOG BDUG SPOS, MAR ME, DRI CHAB, ZHAL ZAS RNAMS SO, ,GONG DU YANG GTOR MA BZANG PO BSHAMS NAS BYIN GYIS RLABS LA, 'DZIN GTOR BYAS TE MJUG TU GTONG, 'DI NI 'CHI BSLU BA'I MAN NGAG YIN GZUNG, ,BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU BA'I CHO GA DPON STON SKYER SGANG PA CHEN PO NAS BRGYUD PA'O, ,SHIN TU NAS BRGYUD PA NYE ZHI BYIN RLABS CHE BA YIN PAS SHES LDAN RNAMS KYI LAG LEN MDZOD CING, BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
